text:
Hey Pheya!
Well done! Its good to have something right after you graduate. In the meantime explore/learn things you wish to know more about. once you are in the job it might be a bit hard.

indeed we draw a bit from other things we do. plan for the unexpected and it should be fun.


Excellent! good to be busy.
one tip: plan on 3(or 5 things) you wish to do at fmx as there might be a lot going on there.

Have fun
